column1: Table 4-95:  Emissions of HFCs and PFCs from ODS Substitution (Metric Tons)

column2: a Others include HFC-152a, HFC-227ea, HFC-245fa, HFC-43-10mee, HFO-1234yf, C4F10, and PFC/PFPEs,
the latter being a proxy for a diverse collection of PFCs and perfluoropolyethers (PFPEs) employed for solvent applications.
